"Ran": "Greetings! Bruder told me that you wanted to learn about all the different ways of fighting on Halpha."
"Actually, I have a request for you that pertains to that very subject..."
"In order to support ARKS as an Operator, I'm currently conducting my own research on various enemies."
"Would you let me monitor your condition while you fight various enemies out in the field?"
"Out of all of the Operators at Command, I'm actually the newest one here. I want to catch up to the others as quickly as I can."
"So in order to do that, I was thinking I'd first expand my knowledge of our enemies."
"Therefore, I want to take measurements of the \"PSE Burst\" phenomenon that's brought about by changes in the atmospheric PSE."
"When a \"PSE Burst\" occurs, it causes waves of enemies to descend upon the surrounding area."
"Mt. Magnus has had an increase in activity lately, so could you go defeat some enemies there while I monitor the PSE fluctuations?"
"Oh, I see... Let's speak at another time then, okay?"
"If there's anything I can do for you as an Operator, simply say the word."
"I want to make things as easy as I can for everyone."
"This mission is surely going to be fraught with peril. We'll be running support for you with everything we've got!"
